segments.text: Hey , Mr Brown . How are you ? Look at that smile on your face !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Recently it's been pretty good , actually .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's what we like to hear , a profitable business .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , yes . Thanks , there's no trouble at the moment .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So , what can I do for you today ? Are you needing to withdraw or transfer ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm going to need a Deposit Certification , to handle the affairs related to home .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , domestic things ? Yes , of course , we can help you with that .
segments.speaker: S1
